name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Receival of all relevant documentation including HSMP/OHS/QMP/TMPEMP/Procedures
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Joint site inspection to determine agreed scope of work including extent of drainage / vegetation work
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Approval of installation location for VMS boards
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All services marked out and located on site
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Approval of products / materials
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Approval of methodology and works sequence
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All approved vegetation and verge stripping works completed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Drain cleared and reshaped appropriately
2.1 - Saw cutting and removal of existing nosing
FREQUENCY: Prior to new nosing installation

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Sawcutting of all existing asphalt completed and all loose material removed from existing recess and a clear base and sides present to pour new nosing. Sand / grit blasting recommended
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: This ITP Manufacturers Specification
FREQUENCY: After sawcutting / demolition works completion
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Once the recess is clear of debris, insert styrofoam gap former, mix and pour the nosing polymer as per manufactuers specification
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: This ITP Manufacturers Specification
FREQUENCY: After nosing has been poured and set

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Once the polymer has cured, styrofoam filler can be removed. 5mm x 5mm chamfer to be cut into edges of nosing. Undertake further grit blasting, prime the surface and install backing rod
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: This ITP Manufacturers Specification
FREQUENCY: After backing rod has been inserted
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Mix and install approved sealant as per manufactuers specification, ensuring a 12mm recess below pavement level
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: This ITP Manufacturers Specification
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
